title: Gruvbox-Kvantum
description: A Gruvbox color scheme based kvantum theme used to theme Kde Plasma and Qt5/Qt6 applications

title: Linux Dotfiles
description: This is a collection of my config files which is includes configuration files for i3wm, picom, neovim, polybar, glava, mpd, ncmpcpp, rofi, etc.

title: Spotify Adblocking Script for Linux
description: This project consists of an installation script for blocking ads in spotify using host blocking mechanism.
